#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <climits>
using namespace std;
#define N 1005
vector<int> v(1000);
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		int max_val = INT_MIN;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for (int i = 0 ; i < n ; i++)
		{
			int a;
			scanf("%d",&a);
			if (a > max_val)
			{
				max_val = a;
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n",max_val);
	}
	return 0;
}
